subtitle: Mitu is still a footballer and ADP star
title: Fight unbeaten
content:
How women can take the initiative to form their own successful life sentence in a burning example of Mitu. Twenty-year-old Mitu village in Bogra district. Her mother is a housewife and father as a petrol pump low-paid employees. Mitu is the second of three sisters.
Mitu was common for a family. He had a very limited scope. SSC only after the parents wanted to marry her. He is only sixteen years old. Then she thought a bright future. He thought that the BRAC Adolescent Development Programme (ADP) joined the club.

Mitu short time due to their efficiency and morale was the leader of the club. Sport, especially football was very interested. He joined the club girls soccer team. BRAC began its program in the area GOAL Mitu rural sports instructor for the test and passed it. Later, he was promoted to head coach.

Mitu and three daughters together an academy in India to receive training and play netball. He cricket, football and karate training takes.
But the pressure was always on the Mitu to marry. He was still handle things well. In the meantime, she gets the prize for the game of professional football. Computer software for the management of the club to run the program from the computer and English language teaching is arranged.

Mitu forward as an obstacle in the way of his mother, father and did not want to stay. They have changed their decision. They are busy for daughter's wedding. Mitu has continued his studies. He is currently a graduate student in the course of business education. Mitu hope he will join the army or the police department. Currently, eight of the club's GOAL program supervisor.
